reviews.review: Buy prime or else ur fcked!

I do not recommend, you will become addicted just like me. Every day you will want to play again and again and without realizing it you will spend a lot of money on skins. You can also make friends ... but also enemies ... all the neighbors will complain that you are screaming in unknown languages. You will wake up your friends at 8 am to play. You like the game, but you know you will never reach the last rank. The community is not toxic ... we are the ones who`s toxic, we lose 2-3-4 matches in a row and we just want to shout at someone and the slightest mistake. Without realizing it, you will spend hours, days, months, maybe even years on this game and for what purpose? Did you manage to be global? You wake up at 7 am, you warm up in a dead game, but a 12-year-old child comes and takes the game out of your head. Unfortunately, the game kills too many nerves. In the end, I recommend you to play it just for fun and not to buy too expensive skins without open boxes.
